room_title: Escape room "Brewery Heist" by NC Escape in Raleigh - Durham
review: New ownership and you can definitely tell the amount of work they are putting into the rooms. We have done all of the rooms and have been impressed. Highly recommended Brewery Heist!! It's their new room, and the quality and thought put into the room was impressive!

room_title: Escape room "Brewery Heist" by NC Escape in Raleigh - Durham
review: This place is under new ownership and it clearly shows. The brewery heist room was challenging and well thought out. The room design and decor was also top notch. We will definitely be coming back.
